actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to make a technical amendment to the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 so as to include the District of Columbia as a State for purposes of title IV.

summary.text: Includes the District of Columbia under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act for purposes of authorizing the Commissioner of Education to make grants for the strenthening of leadership resources within the District's educational agencies.

titles.title: A bill to make a technical amendment to the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 so as to include the District of Columbia as a State for purposes of title IV.
